website_summaries.verdict: The display case of choice when you really want to properly show off your shot glasses and other small objects.
pros: Each display cubby is large enough for a wide variety of small objects
Made from solid wood with a clear hinged front
cons: Extremely large profile requires extra space in most rooms

customer_reviews.title: Good for short shot glasses ONLY
customer_reviews.text: the photos and description for this shot glass case is very misleading! I don't have any complaints with the quality and it was easy to hang, however, there is no way you are going to fit a tall shot glass in this case. The shelves are not adjustable so there is no way to fit any of the taller shot glasses in any of the spots. I wish I would have read some of the other reviews before purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new shot glass case but I didn’t want to break the bank while doing so. I had read the reviews for this and was slightly skeptical from some of the negative ones. I was pleasantly surprised. I knew it would be on the cheaper side just from the price alone, however I am very happy with this product. It meets all of my expectations. I really like that I can close the case as well so the shot glasses don’t become extremely dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Lehman

customer_reviews.title: I've always been satisfied with Amazon purchases in the past
customer_reviews.text: Unit is 4 months old. I opened the display door today, and the door fell off the case. The "hinges" are screwed into the case with micro-screws that are simply too small to support the weight of door. I've always been satisfied with Amazon purchases in the past; this display case, . . . .not at all. Don't waste your money or time on this one, unless you want to repair it after a few months, like I'll have to do! :(
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mini boos
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to display my daughter’s miniature collection - this box is great! No glass to worry about and sturdy on the wall. The clip lock is a little flimsy, but after reading reviews, I expected that. It bent when I took it out of the box - but I was able to bend it back in place to where it holds the door shut - when it wears out, I’ll just replace it! Easy fix - my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking black shot shadow box.
customer_reviews.text: I will say the packing/shipping of this wood shot glass box is done horrible, because the first one I received had a crack in the corner of the box. It was shipped in a MUCH larger box without any kind of filling. So it was moving around quite a bit during shipping I assume. However Amazon is awesome and shipped out a replacement right away even before I sent the damaged one back. The replacement was packaged the SAME way but thankfully no damage to it. It looks real nice in our bar area and was easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, easily broken. Not shatterproof plexiglass as described.
customer_reviews.text: The description says it has “shatterproof” plexiglass but it more like flimsy plastic. While hanging it up I dropped a small frame on it and it not only shattered the plexiglass but broke the door off it’s hinges. The frame was not that heavy. I have two other identical cases that were purchased elsewhere but are much sturdier with true shatterproof plexiglass. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this display case! I wish it could fit tall glasses but for the price its unbeatable and the simple design will make it easy for me to match another case with to hold the tall glasses that I have still. Couldn't be happier. Also just want to point out that it doesn't have regular glass, more like plexiglass which is nice because I won't be worried about it breaking when I move.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I was Very disappointed when it arrived I opened it and the screws that hold the door on were all striped and fell out and the wood on both sides was cracked I don't think it was from shipping I think it was from the poor quality of the case those tiny screws are too small to support the weight of the door thankful i had a friend that was able to repair it for me also it only holds the small shot glasses the slots are to short to hold the taller one as it shows in the picture I would not recommend this to anyone unless you want poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Mary meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a present for my boyfriend for Christmas that would keep giving. I bought this for shot glasses so we can start collecting them as we start to travel more as a couple. He loved it and thought it was a great idea. Plenty of space for regular size shot glasses
customer_reviews.author: Carley2332

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all!
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and size. I was not amused with the fact that one of the frame pieces was not attached, and I had to glue it back into place. The bottom hinge on the door was loose and the little lock is a joke and it does not keep the door closed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Holds a ton of shot glasses but won't hold any tall ones or fat ones. I was using a spice rack to hold his shot glasses prior and decided to buy this once he received more shot glasses. I will have to buy another eventually since he collects them but I am happy that I found this for such an amazing price. It also is hanging on the wall and looks amazing on the wall and not tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Nicks

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but still looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Multiple 1 and 2 star reviews complaining about how "cheap" this thing is... it's inexpensive, but sturdy. Yes, it has a plexi-glass front instead of real glass, but who cares? it's still nice, it looks perfectly fine. Yes, it's pressed wood, but again... who cares? it is still solid and looks fine. If you want someone high end and expensive, don't expect to get it from the most inexpensive case on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James Husted

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product, I did take off the plexyglass cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Tsum Tsum collection I actually bought two of them they fit perfectly in the boxes and I have them hung on the wall in my craft room, as soon as I finish filling number two I will be buying more , think outside the shot glass, this is a great product, I did take off the plexyglass cover.
customer_reviews.author: donellen

customer_reviews.title: Good value buy to hold shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: The frame is about the quality you would expect from the price. Looks excellent on the way though, You can't tell a difference! Be very careful though as it is mounted like a frame, so it can come off the wall if you're not careful! Also note that the cover is plastic and not glass!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be hung!
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI, the lip of the case covering goes over the bottom So when you try to place it on a shelf the lid will pop open as the latch is not too sturdy. Does what i needed it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Valenties Day for his shot glasses that he has collected during our cruises. It is very nice quality, door clasp works well, door cover is nice to keep out dust. It is very easy to hang and already has hangers on the back. It fit both the small and larger shot glasses easily. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-n-Beth

customer_reviews.title: perfect as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described. Fits my standard shot glasses and look very good on my bar wall. If your collection has oversized shot glasses, supplement this purchase with another case with wider and taller cubicles.
customer_reviews.author: El Capitan de Nube Escondido

customer_reviews.title: Great Display case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's tiny stuffed animals which we put on display in her room. Only thing, is that the latch is not super tight, but I put a little piece of clear tape on it. Other than that, it is a great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: not all bad
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this display case closed however upon opening you can see its not as strong as i would have thought the the plastic is no thicker than something you would tear a fresh pack of batteries out of at the store and the slats that make up the shelves are wedged into place no glue or anything and the seams hidden by tape all things considered not bad for what you pay pretty display box but if you're looking sor something more on the solid side I would keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Shawn sanders

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. I bought this for a gift for someone
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I bought this for a gift for someone, and I recieved it with scuff marks, white markings on it. Definitely not worth it. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: bailey clark

customer_reviews.title: It's ok needs a better latch
customer_reviews.text: For what it is I like it. However the latch that came with it is has the strength of a aluminum soda can, mine came bent and eventually broke when I tried to bend it back so it works. The glass is actually a thin sheet of flexible witch is good at least for me because I don't think it'd break as easily. For the price I cant complain to much I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Trash, Trash and more Trash!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trash, Trash and more Trash!!!! How dare you send someone this garbage. This item was sent to me in poor condition. There’s no way this happened in transit. It’s not as big as I thought either. Just unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double check everything before hanging
customer_reviews.text: I bought one previous and really liked it so I ordered a new one and when it came in the hinge screws were stripped out. When trying to hang it found out that using the template on the back do not equal the hangers on the back of the display case. End up drilling extra holes in the wall. Went to hang it up with the screws there were no screws
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: sheet plastic on front very  flimsey
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed Just opened it and the cabinet is nice but its ruined by a really cheap plastic sheet instead of glass or plexi glass Looks like plastic pulled off a roll Good possibliliy I will return $40 a lot for it Sad I was hopeing for better
customer_reviews.author: Bet

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shot glass shelf without spending a ton of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shot glass shelf without spending a ton of money. It has a plexi glass door so it keeps the shelf from being overly heavy, but also keeps things from getting dusty like the open cabinet shelves
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am severely disappointed. 1. The paint was already chipped. 2. The door isn't made of glass, it's cheap plastic. 3. The wood feels thin also. I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Sarah St

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: "Glass" front is actually plexiglass and box is made of MDF, so not sure how long it will last in the moisture of our outside bar, but works great for keeping shot glasses clean and handy. It will not fit the tall shot glasses, but there is a larger size case that has some taller spots.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Exactly what I needed. Make sure you read the details. I saw a lot of negative reviews about not being able to fit larger shot glasses, which I don't agree should be a negative on this product. You get exactly what they described and that's great. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was led to believe that it would hold "double shot" shot glasses. It doesn't. The spaces are to short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. My son keeps his superhero collectible figurines in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I actually like the case but I have a problem with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the case but I have a problem with the packaging. The box has two "drill here" holes to make hanging easy. Unfortunately I didn't check and drilled. They DID NOT match the brackets. CHECK BEFORE DRILLING HOLES TO HANG!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look to organize collection.
customer_reviews.text: After initial damage with first order, a successful second delivery with good results. Will be giving as a gift but it's anticipated to be a nice addition to a growing collection for a family member !
customer_reviews.author: David G. Long

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The clear piece had been pushed against the shelf and broke across that line. Very poor quality produce for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but surviving
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, I am slightly disappointed in the frame. The construction is decent, the plastic front cover doesn't bother me, but it does not fit all types of shot glasses. Shooters do not fit like they do in the picture and shot glasses with handles also do not fit. Now, half my collection will have to wait for a different case.
customer_reviews.author: Starbuck85

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my sister so she could display of the shot glasses around the world places that I have a visit
customer_reviews.author: M Lovvorn

customer_reviews.title: OK for small shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: The display case is OK for short shot glasses but not larger ones. Display picture miss leading.
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN

customer_reviews.title: absolute trash... which is where it went ...
customer_reviews.text: absolute trash... which is where it went. the cheap door hinges where broken and the cheap wood was split in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Patriwoo

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and it looks awesome hanging on his wall
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my father-in-law. He finally hung it up and put his shot glasses in it. He loves it and it looks awesome hanging on his wall.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for double shot glasses!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this case today. For some reason, I thought the front would be glass but it is plastic. It fits regular shot glasses and taller ones that hold about 2oz but regular double shot 3oz glasses will not fit in this case (even though from the product picture it looks like they would). Other than that we are pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Prince-Redman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case - Check Hanger distance
customer_reviews.text: The display case is very nice looking and contemporary. The box it comes in is suppose to be used as a template for installing hangers for the case. DO NOT use this template until checking the actual hanger distance on the back of the display case. There was a 2 inch difference between the template and the actual hanger locations on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Slogans

customer_reviews.title: Is Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice little display case, It does not get 5 stars because I am not crazy with how flimsy the clear plastic they used instead of glass is, and I also would rather see the hinge on the door on the left side of the cabinet. It is also a bit pricey especially considering the use of clear plastic and not glass. I would buy one again just have to keep in mind its faults.
customer_reviews.author: havet1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shelf For Perfume Oils
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shelf to house my perfume oils. It's just what I was looking for, and the perfect color, black. The door has the clasp to hold it shut and it's got a plexiglass front. It's a really great deal for the price. Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Margo D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Better than something i could have made myself.
customer_reviews.text: Glass is scratched and the color makes the shot glasses a little hard to see. The latch wasn't properly installed so I replaced it with a magnetic strip.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I love that there is a door that keeps the shot ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a door that keeps the shot glasses in, however the picture looks like double shot glasses can fit in it and they cannot. I got 2 because of the massive collection of shot glasses I have and none of my double shot glasses will fit in them. Very disappointed and had to return one. Overall product has decent manufacturing, but isn't the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but for the price I'm really not complaining
customer_reviews.text: Could be better, but for the price I'm really not complaining. The clear cover is nice, there's a lot of slots. My only complaint is that they're all one size slots.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R

customer_reviews.title: Goos
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hold high shot glasses but it holds the regular size ones. I love how it’s making my glasses look more organized and less dust
customer_reviews.author: Immadiva1024

customer_reviews.title: won't fit double shots
customer_reviews.text: Pros: price and looks Cons: Plastic window and cubby sizes i cut two vertical rows of shelves out, the lowest, and the highest, and i spread them and re-epoxied them, then spray painted it all black again. it still looks great, and i have 12 spots for double tall glasses. i plan to do this with a second one as well, but my exacto saw blade broke
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS LOOK AT THE MEASUREMENTS
customer_reviews.text: I felt misled by the picture of this display. None of the tall shot glasses that I have collected fit in it. I've learned my lesson. Study the measurements of whatever I'm ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for smaller ones.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these with the hope that the slots would be able to fit my average "tall" shot glasses.. They don't. Construction is good though. Fits the smaller shots w/out a problem.
customer_reviews.author: S. Witte

customer_reviews.title: I love how this comes with the door so it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this comes with the door so it's not ope exposing the glasses to being bumped or falling out. I did have a little anxiety hanging the site up because there were only two small saw hanger pieces on the back and wish there was a more secure way to hang the item. I had tall shooters that didn't fit which is the main reason I got this to put them in. It fits all my other shot glasses thought and has lots of room for more!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works perfect nice doesn't fit long shot glasses though
customer_reviews.author: Kim N Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vinylmation
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger then I expect (which is a good thing). The case is great for displaying Disney Vinylmation figures, even the ones with large hats can fit in there! Highly recommend if you want to display your Vinylmation or any collectibles
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, 4 stars because I wish the teeth on the back that hang on the wall were bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Solo

customer_reviews.title: Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I want pleased with was the arrival time was after the gift date even though it said it would be here 10 days before. But he still loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Harris

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love our shot glass display case. I just wish I'd read the details more closely because our tall double-shot glasses don't fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my son and he has it ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son and he has it hanging in his room with all his little shot glasses that he has collected.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi P.

customer_reviews.title: lovely latching door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as part of a birthday gift. He has a collection of shot glasses from all over the world that were just sitting on a table and now we have somewhere to put them. It has a glass door in front and it latches so stuff won't just fall out if a door shuts too hard. We have it hanging on the wall and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and shot glasses fit well and are easily viewed.
customer_reviews.author: gnat

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and every time I tried to get someone on the phone to return it I never had a return call. I order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The plastic was broken when it came. We have not been able to use it! This has to be the worst product I've ever purchased and it was a gift for my fiance
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia Gatley

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but around one hinge the "wood" or whatever material it is was cracked leaving the hinge loose and hanging. Definitely done in production, not during shipping and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice: -) Got all my nick knack in one ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice :-) Got all my nick knack in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for LOL doll  Display
customer_reviews.text: I love these I use them for lol doll display :) there hinged glass well I think plexi glass but see photo they look so cute and hang on wall if u buy 2 you can hang side by side close together and tehy look liek a display cabinet just be sure to re enforce the screws the hinges tend to be extremely flimsy :) besides that perfect and reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: trstnikki

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The lock was not fully installed correctly but I fixed it and it work’s great now
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice hanging shot glass case. My only advice would be to make each slot about 1/2 to 3/4 of an inch taller so that you can display the new popular taller style shot glasses in it.
customer_reviews.author: blueridgeboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for small shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but too bad my tall shot glasses don't fit. I thought the middle shelves were taller, but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love that it holds various size shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love that it holds various size shot glasses. Didn't like the side the door opens but that is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: Description stated "Black wood shot glass case" but it is definitely not wood. It appears to be pressed paper board stained black. The surface is kind of puffy. The description is misleading. Price is cheap but is it only good price if this is REAL wood. For pressed paper or fake-wood it is not a deal. From the look of it I know it would not last long. And the "hinged glass front" is just a paper-thin plastic sheet. Just not as described. Going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David Tang

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, and great visability
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible for D&D figures. Cheap, beautiful, and great visability.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Pham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's an awesome addition to my living room, looks cool and keeps my shot glasses in a safe place
customer_reviews.author: Mary Streeter

customer_reviews.title: Not to sure about this item.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it was used. Scratches and dents. It could be a really good item.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Attractive case
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these cases. The only 2 negatives is the front door is made of a thin plastic and it does not hold taller shot glasses. Otherwise, it is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case for the price, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dantor

customer_reviews.title: Great wish it was a lil wider some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wish it was a lil wider some of the novelty shot glasses did not fit but regular one no problem
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Studied than I thought it would be. Real glass.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - got it for my son. Fits all but the widest shot glasses (two out of his collection). It's nice not to see the dust glasses scattered on his table anymore. For the value I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: I sent them back (2). 2oz shot glasses did not fit. All 2oz shot glasses are 4.25" tall
customer_reviews.author: Scoops007

customer_reviews.title: PLS DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Door broke within 5 minutes. Fake glasses shattered. Hinges are awful and can't hold tall or wide shot glasses. Honestly a pretty cheap product. You could probably make something better.
customer_reviews.author: Simmeon Mammo

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on a white wall
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on a white wall. Fits easily and has not broken. I'm quite happy with my purchase. But you can get the glass ones at Michaels if that's what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: archana

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage
customer_reviews.text: These cabinets are great for hold multi size shot glasses. It's nice hard wood, a good quality holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: They’re good. This is the fourth I buy. Got a big collection now
customer_reviews.author: leonardo

customer_reviews.title: came damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's a great display case for my shot glass collection but mine came damaged with a big scratch on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to display my shot glass collection based on the picture showing double shot glasses fitting. Imagine my surprise and dismay when all but one of my shot glasses DIDN'T FIT! I am disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Fit the need
customer_reviews.text: It was close to what we expected, except for thin plastic film, instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits most tall shot glasses and is very easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Fits most tall shot glasses and is very easy to hang! Wish they were still available so I could get another.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Shot Glass Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet, but didn't have slots for my tall shot glasses. Had to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Packaging was excellent. Actually surprised at the quality. However, my large shot glasses could not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the front was glass but it's a piece of plastic. need to read closer
customer_reviews.author: coolone

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars if they came with screws. Looks good. I did run a screw through the back center bottom space to help secure it more soundly to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: chilepeppa

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality , I had seen one at my daughters and asked where she got it -she sent me the link on here and I ordered two for myself worth double the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it! Arrived just as pictured. I only ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving it! Arrived just as pictured. I only wish that there were some slots for the taller shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sipped quickly. I liked that box had template for hanging as well made everything quick and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Carter

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: The demons ions are misleading. My shot glasses did not fit. Very unsatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: khalee88

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful case, well made and inexpensive. My only issue is the glare when the case is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Kent

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Visible scraped spots on frame. Plastic front has visible scuffed marks.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine M Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Display Case
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed to show off our shot glass collection. Loos nice and displays the shot glasses very well
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It came securely packaged. Exactly what I was looking for. Looks really good..
customer_reviews.author: jodi birckett

customer_reviews.title: It's not really high quality, but it does a decent job, while looking nice...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my spouse's shot glass collection and he liked it. It has a plexi-glass window in front, not real glass, but he was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.text: Does not fit tall shot glasses!!!1 Extremely disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Case looks really good, and does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Case looks really good, and does exactly what it's supposed to. The only thing is it won't hold the double shotglasses, they're too tall.
customer_reviews.author: tristar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for a shot glass collection. I have 5 of these filled already.
customer_reviews.author: Jonston Strothers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was nice but doesn't hold tall shot glasses but use for all the others
customer_reviews.author: GAIL SPENCER

product_meta.title: Gallery Solutions 18x16 Shot Glass Display Case with Hinged Front in Black
product_meta.description: Gallery Solutions' 18x16 Shot Glass Display Case with Hinged Front is the perfect way to display your most memorable shot glasses or other collectible items. This durable cabinet is crafted from solid wood and features a hinged clear front to easily update your collection. It's sleek black finish makes it a handsome addition to any home bar, office or den. Features ready-to-hang durable hangers on the back for vertical or horizontal hanging options or it can be displayed on a tabletop. The 28 Shot Glass Display Case with Hinged Front in Black measures 18 inches x 16.5 inches x 3 inches overall and each opening measures 3.5 inches tall. Makes an excellent gift for any shot glass collector!
feature_bullets: Durable solid wood frame in sleek black finish
Holds 28 shot glasses. Each opening is 3.5 inches tall
Hinged cabinet front door features shatter resistant plexi glass
Display case measures 18 inches x 16.5 inches x 3 inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
